modules.description: This module provides functions for safely managing resource cleanup and explicitly discarding values of common types without side effects. It includes operations like `finally` for ensuring cleanup code runs after a function, and type-specific `ignore_*` functions to explicitly ignore values. Use cases include handling temporary resources like file handles or network connections, and suppressing unused value warnings in a type-safe manner.

This module extends standard OCaml types with safe resource management and explicit value discarding. It provides functions like `finally` for guaranteed cleanup after function execution and type-specific `ignore_*` functions to suppress unused value warnings without side effects. It works directly with common types like `unit`, `exn`, and handles for external resources such as file descriptors or network connections. Use cases include managing temporary file handles, ensuring release of system resources, and explicitly ignoring return values in a type-safe way.
